title: Nine Eleven Ten
description: Fandom: X-Men: First ClassRelationship: Erik Lehnsherr/Charles Xavier--------------------------------------------------Years later, Charles would remember that day. Sometimes he would wonder if he could have changed anything; other times he would despair over what he had since become. But he would always hold the image in his mind: Raven, laughing, and his thoughts flying alongside her on strong wings, silver-gold through the winter air. Once upon a time.------Cover (shown here) by cazzylimerence, found here.Cover by avictoriangirl, found here.
author: Subtilior
